     <!-- Intro Fragment -->
     <section class="fragment intro" data-lucid-group="Intro">
      <div class="intro__content">
       <p>
        Our
        <strong>
         Fayetteville, AR
        </strong>
        , practice is committed to combining state-of-the-art science with an artistic approach to provide you with life-changing and natural-looking results. We understand your features and goals are unique, and we tailor each procedure to help you achieve your desired results while maintaining your natural beauty.
        <strong>
         Plastic surgeon
        </strong>
        <a href="/about-dr-atwood">
         H. Daniel Atwood
        </a>
        provides unlimited consultation time between his nurses and patients to ensure that you feel confident and knowledgeable about your treatment.
       </p>
      </div>
     </section>
     <!-- Testimonial (1) Fragment -->

       Our
      </h2>
      <h3 class="fragment__header_subtitle palette-typekit medium">
       Mission
      </h3>
     </div>
     <section class="fragment testimonial full-width no-image" data-lucid-group="Testimonial (1)">
      <div class="quotebox ">
       <div class="quotebox__content ">
        <blockquote class="quotebox__quote">
         "My personal goal is to provide you with the highest quality of plastic surgery care and expertise to help you feel more confident, increase your self-esteem, and improve your quality of life. At our practice, your results will look natural."
        </blockquote>
        <p class="quotebox__signature">
         Dr. Atwood
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </section>
     <!-- Content 50_50 (2) Fragment -->
     <section class="fragment content" data-lucid-group="Content 100 (2)">
      <div class="content__100">
       <div class="fragment__header full-title-height" id="">
        <img class="fragment__header_bg" src="//d21xh06p65pae.cloudfront.net/www.hdanielatwoodmd.com/assets/images/p/celadon/h2-v1532458927.png"/>
        <h2 class="fragment__header_title palette-typekit tk-mrs-eaves-xl-serif medium" style="position: relative; ">
         Plastic Surgeon
        </h2>
        <h3 class="fragment__header_subtitle palette-typekit medium">
         H. Daniel Atwood
        </h3>
       </div>
       <div class="content__section">
        <div class="content__richtext">
         <p>
          <img alt="Dr. H. Daniel Atwood" class="img-right" height="256" src="https://d1l9wtg77iuzz5.cloudfront.net/assets/5335/213091/original.jpg?1515004134	" width="256"/>
          Dr. H. Daniel Atwood wants you to look like the most refreshed, rejuvenated, and healthy version of yourself, rather than looking like a plastic surgery patient. Renowned throughout the medical community, Dr. Atwood often receives referrals from other nurses and doctors for patients who want revisional
          <a href="/procedures/breast-augmentation">
           breast augmentation
          </a>
          and
          <a href="/procedures/breast-lift">
           breast lift
          </a>
          procedures. Each consultation involves an in-depth discussion of your goals. He will also hand-sketch illustrations to help you understand the results his treatments can provide.
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </section>
     <!-- Affiliations (1) Fragment -->
     <section class="fragment affiliations">
      <img class="affiliations__bg" data-src="//d21xh06p65pae.cloudfront.net/www.hdanielatwoodmd.com/assets/images/p/celadon/blog-left-v1532458927.png"/>
      <img class="affiliations__bg" data-src="//d21xh06p65pae.cloudfront.net/www.hdanielatwoodmd.com/assets/images/p/celadon/blog-right-v1532458927.png"/>
      <div class="fragment__header " data-lucid-group="Affiliations (1)" id="">
       <img class="fragment__header_bg" src="//d21xh06p65pae.cloudfront.net/www.hdanielatwoodmd.com/assets/images/p/celadon/h2-v1532458927.png"/>
       <h2 class="fragment__header_title palette-typekit tk-mrs-eaves-xl-serif medium" style="position: relative; ">
        Affiliations
       </h2>
      </div>
      <div class="affiliations__images" data-lucid-group="Affiliations (1)">
       <div class="images-container odd count-3">

     <!-- Content 50_50 (1) Fragment -->
     <section class="fragment content" data-lucid-group="Content 100 (1)">
      <div class="content__100">
       <div class="fragment__header full-title-height" id="">
        <img class="fragment__header_bg" src="//d21xh06p65pae.cloudfront.net/www.hdanielatwoodmd.com/assets/images/p/celadon/h2-v1532458927.png"/>
        <h2 class="fragment__header_title palette-typekit tk-mrs-eaves-xl-serif medium" style="position: relative; ">
         Our State-of-the-Art
        </h2>
        <h3 class="fragment__header_subtitle palette-typekit medium">
         Surgery Center
        </h3>
       </div>
       <div class="content__section">
        <div class="content__richtext">
         <p>
          Dr. Atwood is the co-owner and medical director of Surgical Arts Surgery Center, which is conveniently located close to our office. Most major surgical procedures including
          <a href="/procedures/facelift">
           facelifts
          </a>
          and
          <a href="/procedures/liposuction">
           liposuction
          </a>
          are performed at this modern, private facility. Surgical Arts Surgery Center features state-of-the-art technology and an experienced staff prepared to make your experience safe, comfortable, and rewarding.
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </section>
     <!-- Block Menu (1) Fragment -->
     <section class="fragment block-menu " data-lucid-group="Block Menu (1)">
      <div class="fragment__header full-title-height" id="">
       <img class="fragment__header_bg" src="//d21xh06p65pae.cloudfront.net/www.hdanielatwoodmd.com/assets/images/p/celadon/h2-v1532458927.png"/>
       <h2 class="fragment__header_title palette-typekit tk-mrs-eaves-xl-serif medium" style="position: relative; ">
        Featured
       </h2>
       <h3 class="fragment__header_subtitle palette-typekit medium">
        Procedures
       </h3>
      </div>
      <div class="block-menu__items">
       <!-- Block Menu Item (1) -->
       <div class="block-menu__item" data-lucid-group="Block Menu Item (1)">
        <figure class="block-menu__figure lazy-bg" data-background="//d21xh06p65pae.cloudfront.net/www.hdanielatwoodmd.com/assets/images/p/celadon/brush-fat-v1532458927.png">
         <a class="block-menu__image-wrapper rounded-box" href="/procedures/breast-augmentation">
          <img src="https://d1n5s2tett0dwr.cloudfront.net/O9uyJGuIbWpREQ-Sd5ABzYV-2_A=/480x300/filters:no_upscale()/https%3A%2F%2Fd1n5s2tett0dwr.cloudfront.net%2FhaX6rmaisKiR7l_rLiWr-DbfZf0%3D%2F480x300%2Ffilters%3Ano_upscale%28%29%3Aquality%2899%29%2Fhttps%3A%2F%2Fd3b3by4navws1f.cloudfront.net%2F208966672-3.jpg"/>
         </a>
         <figcaption class="block-menu__caption">
         </figcaption>
        </figure>
        <div class="block-menu__text-wrapper">
         <h3 class="block-menu__item-title">
          Breast Augmentation
         </h3>
         <div class="block-menu__item-text">
          <p>
           Dr. Atwood is a breast implant expert who can help you to achieve precisely the bustline enhancements you desire. His refined techniques provide natural-looking results with minimal scarring.
          </p>
         </div>
         <div class="button-wrapper">
          <a class=" button" href="/procedures/breast-augmentation">
           <span>
            Breast Augmentation
           </span>
          </a>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <!-- Block Menu Item (2) -->
       <div class="block-menu__item" data-lucid-group="Block Menu Item (2)">
        <figure class="block-menu__figure lazy-bg" data-background="//d21xh06p65pae.cloudfront.net/www.hdanielatwoodmd.com/assets/images/p/celadon/brush-fat-v1532458927.png">
         <a class="block-menu__image-wrapper rounded-box" href="/procedures/mommy-makeover">
          <img src="https://d1n5s2tett0dwr.cloudfront.net/2bOQBEFqP3Y7XUxbj-ABU0Zb0M0=/480x300/filters:no_upscale()/https%3A%2F%2Fd1n5s2tett0dwr.cloudfront.net%2FpCWpnxDtYKOGAIsrOc_oOUdR0pw%3D%2F480x300%2Ffilters%3Ano_upscale%28%29%3Aquality%2899%29%2Fhttps%3A%2F%2Fd3b3by4navws1f.cloudfront.net%2F235755910.jpg"/>
         </a>
         <figcaption class="block-menu__caption">
         </figcaption>
        </figure>
        <div class="block-menu__text-wrapper">
         <h3 class="block-menu__item-title">
          Mommy Makeover
         </h3>
         <div class="block-menu__item-text">
          <p>
           A mommy makeover is a fully customized combination of procedures designed to counteract the effects of childbirth on the breasts, midsection, and other areas of the body.
          </p>
         </div>
         <div class="button-wrapper">
          <a class=" button" href="/procedures/mommy-makeover">
           <span>
            Mommy Makeover
           </span>
          </a>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <!-- Block Menu Item (3) -->
       <div class="block-menu__item" data-lucid-group="Block Menu Item (3)">
        <figure class="block-menu__figure lazy-bg" data-background="//d21xh06p65pae.cloudfront.net/www.hdanielatwoodmd.com/assets/images/p/celadon/brush-fat-v1532458927.png">
         <a class="block-menu__image-wrapper rounded-box" href="/procedures/facelift">
          <img src="https://d1n5s2tett0dwr.cloudfront.net/V7KrQ8gR7_o6BF1IasKOJvvXt9I=/480x300/filters:no_upscale()/https%3A%2F%2Fd1n5s2tett0dwr.cloudfront.net%2FDc-yc63REfhmf-5THccHQmYjjwM%3D%2F480x300%2Ffilters%3Ano_upscale%28%29%3Aquality%2899%29%2Fhttps%3A%2F%2Fd3b3by4navws1f.cloudfront.net%2FiStock_15170488_LARGE.jpg"/>
         </a>
         <figcaption class="block-menu__caption">
         </figcaption>
        </figure>
        <div class="block-menu__text-wrapper">
         <h3 class="block-menu__item-title">
          Facelift
         </h3>
         <div class="block-menu__item-text">
          <p>
           Dr. Atwood precedes each facelift procedure with a skin care regimen that can help you to heal properly and experience the best possible benefits of surgical facial rejuvenation.
          </p>
         </div>
         <div class="button-wrapper">
          <a class=" button" href="/procedures/facelift">
           <span>
            Facelift
           </span>
          </a>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <!-- Block Menu Item (4) -->
       <div class="block-menu__item" data-lucid-group="Block Menu Item (4)">
        <figure class="block-menu__figure lazy-bg" data-background="//d21xh06p65pae.cloudfront.net/www.hdanielatwoodmd.com/assets/images/p/celadon/brush-fat-v1532458927.png">

         </a>
         <figcaption class="block-menu__caption">
         </figcaption>
        </figure>
        <div class="block-menu__text-wrapper">
         <h3 class="block-menu__item-title">
          Breast Lift
         </h3>
         <div class="block-menu__item-text">
          <p>
           A breast lift by Dr. Atwood can address the effects of aging, breastfeeding, and weight loss to give your bust line youthful, perky contours that flatter your figure and help you feel confident.
          </p>
         </div>
         <div class="button-wrapper">
          <a class=" button" href="/procedures/breast-lift">
           <span>
            Breast Lift
           </span>
          </a>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <!-- Block Menu Item (5) -->
       <div class="block-menu__item" data-lucid-group="Block Menu Item (5)">
        <figure class="block-menu__figure lazy-bg" data-background="//d21xh06p65pae.cloudfront.net/www.hdanielatwoodmd.com/assets/images/p/celadon/brush-fat-v1532458927.png">
         <a class="block-menu__image-wrapper rounded-box" href="/procedures/tummy-tuck">
          <img src="https://d1n5s2tett0dwr.cloudfront.net/uTJzfE5YjxwDb-ljw9Tlp-93hBA=/480x300/filters:no_upscale()/https%3A%2F%2Fd1n5s2tett0dwr.cloudfront.net%2FBa3XTMFFD5-L-ldkF5OXnxi-nHc%3D%2F480x300%2Ffilters%3Ano_upscale%28%29%3Aquality%2899%29%2Fhttps%3A%2F%2Fd3b3by4navws1f.cloudfront.net%2FiStock_60002500_LARGE_crop.jpg"/>
         </a>
         <figcaption class="block-menu__caption">
         </figcaption>
        </figure>
        <div class="block-menu__text-wrapper">
         <h3 class="block-menu__item-title">
          Tummy Tuck
         </h3>
         <div class="block-menu__item-text">
          <p>
           Dr. Atwood performs abdominoplasty surgery that is fully customized to your goals. It is often combined with Dr. Atwood's precise
           <a href="/procedures/liposuction">
            liposuction
           </a>
           technique to create lean, toned contours.
          </p>
         </div>
         <div class="button-wrapper">
          <a class=" button" href="/procedures/tummy-tuck">
           <span>
            Tummy Tuck
           </span>
          </a>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </section>

     <section class="fragment content" data-lucid-group="Content 100 (3)">
      <div class="content__100">
       <div class="fragment__header full-title-height" id="">

     <!-- AccuRate Fragment -->
     <section class="fragment accurate" data-lucid-group="AccuRate">
      <div class="fragment__header full-title-height" id="">
       <img class="fragment__header_bg" src="//d21xh06p65pae.cloudfront.net/www.hdanielatwoodmd.com/assets/images/p/celadon/h2-v1532458927.png"/>
       <h2 class="fragment__header_title palette-typekit tk-mrs-eaves-xl-serif medium" style="position: relative; ">
        Rate
       </h2>
       <h3 class="fragment__header_subtitle palette-typekit medium">
        Your Experience
       </h3>
      </div>
      <div class="accurate__richtext">
       Read what our patients have to say about their experience, or write your own review.
      </div>
      <iframe data-full-height="254px" data-small-height="254px" id="accurate-iframe" scrolling="no" src="https://www.docshop.com/accurate/embed.php?style=2&amp;sbid=1495-1005678-f147a059d2071c88a0362067437e552998051d52&amp;s=http://www.hdanielatwoodmd.com/" style="width: 100%; height: 254px; overflow: hidden;">
      </iframe>
      <script>
       (function(){
   var el = document.getElementById('accurate-iframe');
   if (typeof el == 'undefined') { return; }
   var fullHeight = el.getAttribute('data-full-height');
   var smallHeight = el.getAttribute('data-small-height');
   if (fullHeight == smallHeight) { return; }
   var lastHeight = el.style.height;
   var resizer = function() {
     if (el.clientWidth < 960) {
       var newHeight = smallHeight;
     } else {
       var newHeight = fullHeight;
     }
     if (newHeight != lastHeight) {
       el.style.height = newHeight;
       lastHeight = newHeight;
     }
   };
   setInterval(resizer, 200);
 })();
      </script>
     </section>
     <!-- Locations Fragment -->
     <section class="fragment locations" data-lucid-group="Locations">
      <div class="fragment__header " id="">
       <img class="fragment__header_bg" src="//d21xh06p65pae.cloudfront.net/www.hdanielatwoodmd.com/assets/images/p/celadon/h2-v1532458927.png"/>
       <h2 class="fragment__header_title palette-typekit tk-mrs-eaves-xl-serif medium" style="position: relative; ">
        Locations
       </h2>
      </div>
      <div class="location">
       <a class="location__map rounded-box" href="https://maps.google.com/?cid=13527375359987513353" target="_blank">
        <img src="https://www.hdanielatwoodmd.com/_cache/static_map_19c264d69d4a2bdcf4c027ef330c1d0c.png"/>
       </a>
       <div class="location__info">
        <h2 class="location__name">
         <a href="/locations/fayetteville-ar">
          Fayetteville Office
         </a>
        </h2>
        <p class="location__address">
         1794 E Joyce Boulevard
         <br/>
         Ste 1
         <br/>
         Fayetteville, AR 72703
        </p>
        <div class="location__buttons ">
         <a class="button" data-ga-event="Location Partial, Get Hours" href="/locations/fayetteville-ar">
          <svg class="info-icon">
           <use xlink:href="#info-icon">
           </use>
          </svg>
          <span>
           More Info
          </span>
         </a>
         <a class="button" data-ga-event="Location Partial, Get Directions" href="https://maps.google.com/?cid=13527375359987513353" target="_blank">
          <svg class="directions-icon">
           <use xlink:href="#directions-icon">
           </use>
          </svg>
          <span>
           Directions
          </span>
         </a>
         <a class="button" data-ga-event="Location Partial, Dial Phone" href="tel:4794437771">
          <svg class="phone-icon">
           <use xlink:href="#phone-icon">
           </use>
          </svg>
          <span>
           (479) 443-7771
          </span>
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </section>
     <!-- Contact Fragment -->
     <section class="fragment contact" data-lucid-group="Contact">
      <div class="fragment__header " id="">
       <img class="fragment__header_bg" src="//d21xh06p65pae.cloudfront.net/www.hdanielatwoodmd.com/assets/images/p/celadon/h2-v1532458927.png"/>

       </h2>
      </div>
      <div class="contact__wrapper">
       <div class="contact-form " style="background-color: ; ">

          </button>

         </fieldset>
        </form>
       </div>
       <div class="quotebox ">

         <blockquote class="quotebox__quote">
          Dr. Atwood is a very knowledgeable and experienced surgeon. He is meticulous, and does the absolute best possible job.
         </blockquote>
         <p class="quotebox__signature">
          Suzanne S.
         </p>
        </div>
